select g.gAbroadNy ,g.gEvent ,g.gLeague ,g.score_home ,g.score_away ,g.player_home ,g.player_away ,g.stadium ,DATE_FORMAT(g.gameDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as gameDate ,DATE_FORMAT(g.gameDuration, '%H:%i') as gameDuration ,g.gCreatedAt ,g.gModifiedAt ,g.gcDelNy ,t1.teamSeq+24 as team_home ,t2.teamSeq+24 as team_away from game g inner join team t1 on t1.teamSeq = g.team_home inner join team t2 on t2.teamSeq = g.team_away where 1=1 AND g.gSeq = #{gSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE game SET gcDelNy = 1 ,modifiedAt = now() where 1=1 and gSeq = #{gSeq}
mapper.select: select g.gSeq ,g.gAbroadNy ,g.gEvent ,g.gLeague ,g.score_home ,g.score_away ,g.player_home ,g.player_away ,g.stadium ,g.gameDate ,DATE_FORMAT(g.gameDuration,'%H:%i') as gameDuration ,g.gCreatedAt ,g.gModifiedAt ,g.gcDelNy ,t1.teamName as team_home ,t2.teamName as team_away from game g inner join team t1 on t1.teamSeq = g.team_home inner join team t2 on t2.teamSeq = g.team_away where 1=1 and g.gcDelNy = 0 and date_format(gameDate, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY g.gameDate ASC ,g.gameDuration ASC limit 99999999999 )aa
